title: Beijing Confronts a Smaller, Grayer China Dream
content:
1. Beijing Confronts a Smaller, Grayer China Dream  The Wall Street Journal

  3. China demographic crisis looms as population growth slips to slowest ever  Reuters
  4. Census figures add up to a huge challenge for China’s policymakers  South China Morning Post
